node.title: The trailer for the Sex and the City reboot has dropped. Here's what we learnt from it
node.alt: Sarah Jessica Parker sitting in front of a radio microphone with no rings on her fingers.
node.description: Fans have been picking at social media posts and paparazzi shots for details about And Just Like That... since it went into production, but the new clips reveal juicy clues about the lives of Carrie, Charlotte and Miranda.
node.content:
["Carrie, Charlotte and Miranda are back in the trailer for\u00a0the Sex and the City reboot And Just Like That...", "Fans have no doubt been following the social media accounts of the show's stars\u00a0Sarah Jessica Parker, Kristin Davis and Cynthia Nixon for scraps of info about what will happen in the reboot.\u00a0", "But the trailer has offered up more morsels to pick at.\u00a0", "Here's what we know/speculate.\u00a0", "
The boys are back in town
", "Chris North will reprise his role\u00a0as Mr Big, David Eigenberg is back as Steve Brady and Even Handler is returning as Harry Goldenblatt.", "We already knew that.\u00a0", "But the new scenes give us a brief glimpse into how their relationships are going.\u00a0", "We see a few scenes with Mr Big and Carrie looking all loved up in their super luxe apartment with the lounge-room-sized walk-in wardrobe.\u00a0", "However, if you look really closely, you'll notice a few scenes where Carrie's wearing a wedding ring and a few scenes where she's not.", "This could mean nothing. But Sex and the City nerds all know the significance of Carrie's clothing \u2014 the woman sometimes makes bonkers fashion choices, but they are deliberate choices.", "She made a big thing about not wearing her engagement ring on her finger back in the Aiden days and we all remember how that turned out ...", "
Will Miranda come out as queer?
", "That's a massive fan theory floating around at the moment, given Nixon identifies as queer and has been married to a woman since 2012.\u00a0", "And the inclusion of\u00a0Sara Ramirez, a bisexual actor you might recognise from her stint as Dr\u00a0Callie Torres in Grey's Anatomy,\u00a0fuelled that fire.\u00a0", "However, Steve appears to be still very much in the picture and after more scrupulous spying on Miranda's left hand, it appears she's still married for at least some of the show.", "But there's a lot of talk about \"new chapters\" and a lot can happen in 10 episodes, so don't stop believing.\u00a0", "
Carrie cooks now?
", "Huge if true.\u00a0", "Mr Big says: \"I remember when you kept your sweaters in the stove,\" which suggests that Carrie doesn't do that anymore.", "Of course, it may be because having a wardrobe the size\u00a0of a shipping container took care of that storage issue, but it could be a signifier of massive personal\u00a0growth.\u00a0", "I mean, being able to throw a decent pasta together might not be a big thing for most people, but this is a woman who said cheese fondue \u2014 yes, melted cheese and with torn up bits of bread \u2014 was the only recipe she could ever master ... and it was horrible.\u00a0", "
And she's more open-minded about sex?
", "Sex and the City was billed as a sex column, but it was more about romantic relationships, friendships,\u00a0the politics of dating and \u2014 that one time \u2014\u00a0sock drawers.\u00a0", "One of the big criticisms of the show (of which there were many) was that Carrie's column was a little prudish, heteronormative and narrow-minded.\u00a0", "Remember that episode with Alanis Morissette \u2014 yes! that was her!\u00a0 \u2014 where Carrie just couldn't get her head around bisexuality?", "Yikes.\u00a0", "Well, the trailer sees her asked about masturbation on a show called X, Y and Me, which suggests maybe she does become a little less prudish and less conservative.", "However, her answer referencing the demise of department store Barneys implies she's still the same old Carrie, even if she is a little more woke.\u00a0", "
But she's still wearing tutus
", "It's not an exact replica of that iconic tutu from Sex and the City's opening credits or the green tutu she was running around Paris in at the end of the last episode.", "But it is a nod to tulle I'll cling to.\u00a0", "
The Carrie nameplate necklace is also back
", "We all know the significance of this necklace from the final episodes of Sex and the City \u2014 losing it was a metaphor for her losing her sense of self while moping around\u00a0Paris with\u00a0Alexander Petrovsky.", "The trailer shows\u00a0a scene with Carrie wearing the necklace while looking in the bathroom mirror with forlorn resolve while\u00a0we hear Ramirez's character saying: \"If you're not happy with who you are, step out of that box and change\".", "", "
It's not just a necklace, people!\u00a0\u00a0(HBO)
", "Given there's a musing of Carrie saying \"after all the years and all the changes, you're still you\", it smells like somebody's going to question their identity.\u00a0", "And,\u00a0look, I don't want to forecast\u00a0another big break-up, but it looks like that scene is shot in the bathroom of her old apartment, not \"heaven on Fifth\" (Carrie and Big's apartment).\u00a0", "I'm just saying, it makes you think.\u00a0", "
Where can you\u00a0watch And Just Like That in Australia?
", "On Binge and Foxtel.", "The first two episodes will drop on December 9, with the remaining eight to drop each Thursday until the finale airs on February 3.\u00a0"]
